Me encanta este juego y se me dificulta explicar por que.

1) Игра хуйня маньяки видят сквозь стенки потому что перки ахуенные тогда бы сделали его медленней.
2) Постоянно из шкафа вылезаешь и не оглушется маньяк или вовсе не вылезает перс.
3) Игра полная хуйня и не доработанная.

If you aren't playing a 4 man squad as survivor, and don't want to play killer, don't bother buying this game.  The community is toxic.

I really enjoy this game. Its a game that has so many different areas to learn and from. Many different play styles and abilities across all the killers and suvivors. That being said, this game is really not friendly to new comers. The current matchmaking system pins newbies up with/against the best, which makes people expect too much from their teammates. it seems overly complicated to newer players and if you did not get into it somewhat early like i did, it may be too late. Still, this game is a good opportunity to play an originally styled multiplayer game with friends and have a decent time.

Gameplay: 8/10
Matchmaking:5/10
 Teachability: 4/10

Overall: 7/10

прикольн

This game is a toxic relationship. The idea of playing it is cool, but once you play it, it's awful. The devs are so disconnected from the player base it isn't even funny anymore, updating and nerfing things that had no need of updating and/or nerfing while ignoring glaring issues like the massive influx of hackers or even DDoS attacks. It's hard to tell if they're trolling, or just incompetent. The came could so EASILY be much better with a few fixes that require a single braincell to see, but the entire dev team doesn't have one to spare. Things are horribly unbalanced, survivor is hell unless you're in comms with a group, killer is just being bullied by survivor groups, and overall this game has one of the most toxic communities I've ever had the displeasure to be a part of. For your own sake, don't buy this game. Wait for VHS to come out or that new Texas Chainsaw Massacre game. Don't give the idiots behind this game your money.
this game makes me wanna neck my self and keep playing at the same time once u start you cant stop this game has taken over me

Pretty fun muiltplayer game. tons of updates and even free content updates. all the new killers and surivors are now allowed to be unlocked through normal play except guest killers and surviors. Its pretty cool they have gotten the rights to do almost every major horror character from well known horrror films like halloween, nightmare on elm street and hellraiser. looking foward to the ring or ringu chapter this year.

It's an entertaining game, although it can get boring playing on your own for a long time. The bg noise/music for when the killer is near or chasing you really makes the game intense. For me that is but I for one just laugh when being chased.
would recommend but this playerbase will cry about anything you use to win

Most toxic and retarded game i have ever played, few hours in and who do i face as someone who never played killer All Rank 1 players (highest rank you can be) there's no way a player who has never played Killer has that high of Ranking DBD needs to fix the matchmaking system its cross platform why the fuck do i get paired with higher ranking players? you would think they would have there shit together since the game was released in 2016 but no the devs don't care and it shows

I would really Like to reccomend this game as most of the time its extremely fun. but the bleedout timer when you knock a survivor down encourages puppy guarding which is unfun. Promoting this toxic 12 year old style game play is kinda weak imo and I know you can do better then this. If a killer stands on top of a downed survivor for more then 20 seconds they should automatically be penalized 10k - 20k points to encourage ACTUALLY picking them up and placing them on the hook . Thats just my opinion and feedback. If you take out the bleedout timer or enact those penalties Myself and im sure plenty of other negative reviews will turn positive.
